title: Deep neural networks for analysis of Mercury’s planetary exosphere
description: JPCS poster (supplement). Basic version of the chronological collection of manuscripts exploring the conceptual application of machine-learning algorithms for the reconstruction of Mercury’s surface composition from simulated exospheric measurements. Testing three DNN types: MLP in one position, MLP in a 3x3 grid, and CNN in a 5x5 grid. Mineralogy prediction (7 minerals) from exospheric elemental measurements. Simulated dataset - very simplistic split and release processes (only MIV).
